title: Celanese 's revenue 2007 to 2018
summary: In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2011 to 2014, slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2016, and lastly gradually increasing from 2016 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 7155.0 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 5389.0 was reached at Year 2016
